page.title: 06MONYASH VILLAGE HALL
page.content: In 1982 it was decided at a public meeting to build a new village hall with the help of a grant from the{EEC {Integrated Rural Development Scheme. The Monyash Village Hall Steering Committee agreed a long_term lease of the land and the old building belonging to the{Womens Institute. } The new village hall is a timber- frame building clad in a mixture of random limestone and timber.It has cost{Â£38,000}to build.The village contribution (Â£6,500) has been made in labour and materials. The new hall will be used by the local{primary school}as a dining room and school hall and by local organisations such as the Mother and Toddler Group and the W.I..The hall came into use in April,1985 and is to be officially opened by the{Duchess of {Devonshire}later this year.
